prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gilbert S. Bahn Papers, Accession #10237-d, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This volume was loaned to the Library by Gilbert S. Bahn of Moorpark, California, on June 18, 1990. There are no restrictions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This bound volume, entitled Professional Correspondence of Gilbert S. Bahn 1982-1988,contains corrrespondence, memoranda, reports, surveys, newsletters, resumes and employment data, and related papers concerning Gilbert Schuyler Bahn's work as an Engineering Specialist at Hampton Technical Center, a division of the Planning Research Corporation, 1981-1988, formerly Kentron International, Inc., with whom he was employed from 1973-1981. There are papers relating to the Schuyler Technical Library (founded by Bahn in 1952), the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) Langley Research Center, Columbia Pacific University, the American Chemical Society, and California Polytechnic State University. Topics discussed include various aspects of combustion kinetics and Hurricane Allen (1984).
